title: How do I delete a guest user on a PIxel 2? The steps listed on the forum is inaccurate.
content: I have tried using the instructions listed on Google's help forum but it's not accurate. If I go to the users screen from the settings/advanced sections, if I click on "guest" to remove it, it signs me in as the user with no admin rights. If I click the settings wheel next to "guest" it just gives me the option to turn on phone calls for the guest. I can't delete the account. Someone has unauthorized access and is sending texts from my phone.
